III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) This facility is a court operated facility. It is not contracted with Michigan Department
of Health and Human Services therefore, MISEP requirements are not applicable.
3.) This facility is a court operated facility. It is not contracted with Michigan Department
of Health and Human Services therefore, contract/policy requirements are not
applicable.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance at this time.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did not require consultation at this time.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The facility was not required to submit any corrective action plans this licensing period
Interviews:
The staff and youth interviewed did not have any concerns with the facility. The staff
indicated it has been harder to get new staff in than it had been before COVID. The
youth reported they get to do a lot of activities and they attend school at the facility.
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the facility continue on their regular
authorization.
